content: Hello, do you want to buy cheap plumbing leads? I can sell you verified homeowners in your area. Message back to get a great deal!
Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
I'm serious! Buy 100 leads, get 50 free. Want to grow your business fast? Just text YES!
Our service is only for scheduling home maintenance appointments. If you need to book a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service, please let me know.
reason: Unsolicited marketing, not a service inquiry.
